actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act of 1974 to provide a comprehensive, coordinated approach to the problems of juvenile delinquency, and for other purposes.
short_title: Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act Amendments

summary.text: Extends the authorization for appropriations under the Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act for one year (through fiscal year 1978 for such sums as may be necessary).

titles.title: Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act Amendments
A bill to amend the Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act of 1974 to provide a comprehensive, coordinated approach to the problems of juvenile delinquency, and for other purposes.
